projects.title: blockstream.com
projects.description: Main Blockstream landing page. Built with Jekyll from the ground up as part of Blockstreams rebranding effort.

projects.title: blockstream.info
projects.description: Blockstream's block explorer, built using react.

projects.title: store.blockstream.com
projects.description: Blockstream store is a wordpress store that showcases lightning payment technology.

projects.title: volkfi.com
projects.description: Volkfi landing page. I was involved as a contractor in the early efforts of building the site.

projects.title: Blockstream Satellite Transmissions App
projects.description: Blockstream Satellite transmissions app. This web app is available on blockstream.com and allows you to submit files and text messages via the blockstream satellite network. Payments are handled through the lightning network.

projects.title: eTaxBC
projects.description: British Columbia's online tax portal. I spent several years as team lead for eTaxBC development.

projects.title: Gentax
projects.description: Back end system for British Columbia's tax administration software. I've worked in most areas of the software, including the online tax portal eTaxBC, Audit, Discovery, Interfaces, etc.

projects.title: In a Nutshell: Bitcoin and the Blockchain
projects.description: Introductory book on bitcoin and the blockchain, available as ebook and print on amazon. I published this book under my mother's maiden name Schulz (M. Schulz).
projects.alt: In a Nutshell: Bitcoin and the Blockchain
